column1: What is the main purpose of AWS Launch Wizard?
column2: To simplify the deployment of applications on AWS by providing a guided experience and offering best practice-based recommendations.

column1: How does AWS Launch Wizard provide cost transparency?
column2: It offers cost estimates for the recommended AWS resources before deploying the application.

column1: Which AWS service is used by Launch Wizard to deploy the application after configuration?
Can users review and edit the configurations before deploying via AWS Launch Wizard?
column2: Yes, users can review and edit the AWS CloudFormation templates generated for their deployments.
